channel.title: 667/7** edit/pack item bonuses error
channel.description:
soo i currently downloaded the item bonus packer from rune-server and when i run it im getting an error, is there anyone who can change the code?
@echo off title Bonuses Packer java -server -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/* com.rs.tools.ItemBonusesPacker pause
this is the error:
Error: missing `server' JVM at `C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\server\jvm.dll'. Please install or use the JRE or JDK that contains these missing components. Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: 667/7** edit/pack item bonuses error
item.dc:creator: @Snackman Snackman
item.description:
@Snackman wrote:

That error has nothing to do with the bonus packer itself

To fix:

Go to where your java is (your case C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin).
There you will see a map named “Client”. open that map, and copy jvm.dll.
now go to (or if it doesn’t exist, create a map [IN jre7/bin]) server, and paste jvm.dll in there.

Ur problem should now be solved.

Read full topic

item.title: 667/7** edit/pack item bonuses error
item.dc:creator: @xplode xplode
item.description:
@xplode wrote:

soo i currently downloaded the item bonus packer from rune-server and when i run it im getting an error, is there anyone who can change the code?

@echo off
title Bonuses Packer
java -server -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/* com.rs.tools.ItemBonusesPacker
pause

this is the error:

Error: missing server' JVM atC:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\server\jvm.dll’.
Please install or use the JRE or JDK that contains these missing components.
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
